column1: Every single person who has cancer has a pH that is too acidic.
A video shows a "Pizzagate" survivor recounting her story of sexual abuse.
A Tennessee boy died in the arms of a local man portraying Santa Claus during a hospital visit.
McDonald's has a burger filled with Nutella.
Panhandling is a lucrative business, averaging an hourly rate of $50.
A hot microphone picked up President Obama telling Russian President Dmitri Medvedev he would have more flexibility to negotiate on issues like missile defense after the 2012 election.
Donald Trump said that he believes that the Earth is flat.
Folding a $5 bill in a specific pattern will reveal a secret image of a stack of pancakes.
Astronaut Buzz Aldrin sent a tweet claiming that humanity was in danger, and that a mysterious "it" was "evil itself."
A video shows a Muslim man kicking a woman down a set of stairs.
Candy canes were created as Christian symbols representing the blood and purity of Jesus.
There are more trees on Earth than there are stars in the Milky Way galaxy.
Congressional Democrats attempted to implement Sharia law by enacting House Resolution 569, a condemnation of violence and bigotry against Muslims.
Police sketches of Madeleine McCann's alleged kidnappers are a perfect match for Tony and John Podesta.
Chapecoense, the soccer team which lost 19 players in a plane crash, was fined for forfeiting their final match.
President-elect Donald Trump said Africans are poor because "when it rains they think of sex instead of farming."
A California Senate bill gives the state the right to seize children from their families
The house-flipping couple from the HGTV show "Flip or Flop" are divorcing.
